name: EnergyPlus Schema Analyst Agent
description: Agent that interprets EnergyPlus object schemas to help explain, draft, or debug input objects using structured field and metadata information.

skills.name: EnergyPlus Object Schema
skills.description: Understand EnergyPlus model object based on its schema structure, including min-fields, data types, and extensibility.

skills.name: Draft EnergyPlus Object
skills.description: Create a valid IDF object based on its schema, using required fields and filling fields up to the min_fields limit.

skills.name: Debug EnergyPlus Object
skills.description: Validate the structure, field order, and value types of an IDF object string using its schema.
example: Check this Sizing:Zone object for correctness
